name: Shree Bidada Sarvodaya Trust
briefDescription: Shree Bidada Sarvodaya Trust is a charitable non-profit organization. The organization is committed to render medical and surgical treatment to poor & needy patients in rural area of Kutch and Gujarat of all ages, caste & race. The trust is well known for the medical camp it organizes every January as well as every month in village Bidada, Mandvi, Kutch, Gujarat, India. At the January camp patients from over 1200 from rural area are examined & treated as per the need.

address: Plot No 62, Dattashram, Shir Bhalchandra Road, Hindu Colony, Road No. 2
